comments:
Importing an IBM Tivoli LogXML Message log results in missing MsgCatalogTokens in the log records shown in the Log View.

The following exception appears in the eclipse log:

Thread[Basic Context Implementation:N8DAC74001AC11D8800085DAAD551A4E,5,main] - java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.String
	at org.eclipse.hyades.models.cbe.impl.CBEMsgDataElementImpl.eSet(CBEMsgDataElementImpl.java:387)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.BasicEObjectImpl.eSet(BasicEObjectImpl.java:605)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.cbe.XMLCommonBaseEventLoader.addAttribute(XMLCommonBaseEventLoader.java:221)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.util.XMLLoader.attributeValueCharacters(XMLLoader.java:214)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.adapter.formatters.LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.createMsgDataElement(LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.java:846)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.adapter.formatters.LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.createModelElements(LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.java:1808)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.adapter.formatters.LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.processDirectedGraphs(LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.java:412)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.adapter.formatters.LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.processEventItems(LocalLogImportCBEFormatter.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.BasicContext.processMessages(BasicContext.java:252)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.BasicContext.processMessages(BasicContext.java:268)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.BasicContext.processMessages(BasicContext.java:268)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.impl.BasicContext.run(BasicContext.java:174)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:570)

With Marius's help we tracked this problem down to org.eclipse.hyades.loaders.cbe.XMLCommonBaseEventLoader.addAttribute() not handling adding values to a multi-value attribute (eg. a list).
